summary: This module implements an Open Library plugin that exposes a set of HTTP endpoints for administrative and analytical tasks. It supports operations such as clearing the application cache, reloading configuration, retrieving various usage statistics, counting editions by author or work, checking user existence, fetching the most recent record, and translating Open Library identifiers to internal keys. In addition, it provides helper utilities for indexing records, normalizing titles and ISBNs, and invalidating related entries in a memcached store.
business_intent: Enable internal staff and automated tools to monitor, maintain, and optimize the Open Library data platform by providing convenient programmatic access to cache management, configuration refresh, statistical reporting, and entity lookup functions.
